name: Doc
desc: The wise and intelligent dwarf, often depicted with glasses.

name: Grumpy
desc: The grouchy and irritable dwarf, known for his constant complaining.

name: Happy
desc: The cheerful and optimistic dwarf, always sporting a big smile.

name: Sleepy
desc: The sleepy and lethargic dwarf, often dozing off at random times.

name: Bashful
desc: The shy and blushing dwarf, who becomes embarrassed easily.

name: Sneezy
desc: The dwarf with allergies, known for his frequent and uncontrollable sneezing fits

name: Dopey
desc: The goofy and playful dwarf, who is mute and childlike in nature
